snippet.title: Dear Brother - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Dear Brother is an original horror adventure game that we worked on over the summer of 2020, and it's on Steam now! Follow Audrey as she tries to work out the mystery of her missing memories in this adventure game inspired by Japanese horror RPGs. Credits to @AnnaLalaDreams for the music in the game

Free to download:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1629320/Dear_Brother

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/endegames
Visit our homepage on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/endegames
